definition: old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: The face of rape, not shrink Vinci, he continued to prepare the complaint, Tom.
sentences.chinese: 面對霸道，芬奇絕不畏縮，他預備繼承爲湯姆申說。

sentences.english: This essay tries to give an objective comment on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 本文試圖對這一切給以客觀的申說。
